articles.author: Amala Balakrishner, Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mostly higher as investors assess Trump tariff impact - CNBC
articles.description: India is slated to report its inflation data for January. SoftBank Group will be posting its fiscal third-quarter earnings later in the day.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets mostly rose Wednesday as investors digested U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff impact on regional economies.
U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, meanwhile, re-emphasized… [+1350 chars]
